info.+content: ソードアート・オンライン アリシゼーション

Kazuto Kirigaya gets attacked and suffers brain damage. In order to save him and at the same time further his own project at Rath, Kikuoka Seijirou puts Kazuto in a STL (Soul TransLator) machine. Kazuto ends up as Kirito in a new world called Underworld. He befriends a boy called Eugeo and together they try to save a girl named Alice who was taken from Eugeo's village years ago.
Sword Art Online -Alicization- Official USA Website
Sword Art Online Alicization Official English Website
